name: analyze_hemodynamic_data
description: Analyzes raw blood pressure data to calculate key hemodynamic parameters.

setup_commands: git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni.git /tmp/biomni && cd /tmp/biomni && pip install -e . && rm -rf .git

inputs.name: pressure_data
inputs.description: Raw blood pressure measurements in mmHg

inputs.name: sampling_rate
inputs.description: Data acquisition rate in Hz (samples per second)

inputs.name: output_file
inputs.description: Filename to save the calculated parameters

output.description: Research log summarizing the analysis steps and results
